thread.title: All-in-one wallet card to spell end of individual credit card?

title: All-in-one wallet card to spell end of individual credit card?
text:
All-in-one wallet card to spell end of individual credit card? Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 01:36 
A single card that allows shoppers to access various payment options from multiple accounts is being displayed at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona. Jim Drury reports.   
A single card that allows shoppers to access various payment options from multiple accounts is being displayed at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona. Jim Drury reports.  //reut.rs/2EVIdrf
